query:
SELECT 'Total alunos cadastrados' as metrica, CAST(COUNT(*) AS CHAR) as valor FROM alunos
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Alunos com mentoria', CAST(COUNT(DISTINCT alunoId) AS CHAR) FROM mentoring_sessions
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Alunos sem mentoria', CAST(COUNT(*) AS CHAR) FROM alunos WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT alunoId FROM mentoring_sessions)
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Alunos por empresa', '' FROM dual;
SELECT p.nome as empresa, COUNT(a.id) as total_alunos FROM alunos a LEFT JOIN turmas t ON a.turma_id = t.id LEFT JOIN programas p ON t.programa_id = p.id GROUP BY p.nome

UNION ALL
SELECT 'Alunos sem mentoria', CAST(COUNT(*) AS CHAR) FROM alunos WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT alunoId FROM mentoring_sessions)
UNION ALL
